devdoc.details: Simple vault for holding interest liquidity and penalties

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

returns._0: Current balance of USDC tokens in vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

totalReserved.details: Total reserved interest for active deposits

devdoc.title: InterestVault

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Only owner (SavingsBank) can call thisUsed for admin funding AND penalty deposits

release(uint256).notice: Only owner (SavingsBank) can call thisUsed when deposit is withdrawn or cancelled

reserve(uint256).notice: Only owner (SavingsBank) can call thisUsed when user opens deposit to ensure interest is available at maturity

withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Only owner (SavingsBank) can call thisUsed for interest payments to users

userdoc.notice: This is a "dumb" vault - only stores tokens, no business logic  Key Features: - Holds admin-funded liquidity for interest payments - Receives early withdrawal penalties (penalty boosts liquidity) - Only owner (SavingsBank) can deposit/withdraw - No complex logic - just simple storage
